explanation: Funds provided from multiple internal reprogramming actions are transferred back to the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, 23/24, appropriation. This is a congressional special interest item and an emergency budget requirement. FY 2023 REPROGRAMMING DECREASES: -168,873

Funds are available and returned from Ukraine Replacement Tranche #13 due to contract savings because costs to procure items were less than originally estimated. This is a congressional special interest item and an emergency budget requirement.
